text: Grandads-Robbers () is a 1972 Soviet comedy-drama movie directed by Eldar Ryazanov.Марафон фильмов к столетию Юрия Никулина пройдет на канале "Мосфильм. Золотая коллекция"Старики-разбойники It stars Yuri Nikulin, Yevgeny Yevstigneyev, and Olga Aroseva. == Actors == * Yuri Nikulin — Nikolay Sergeevitch Myachikov *Yevgeny Yevstigneyev — Valentin Petrovich Vorobyov * Olga Aroseva — Anna Pavlovna Suzdaleva * Georgi Burkov — Fyodor Fyodorovitch Fedyaev * Andrei Mironov — Yury Yevgenyevitch Proskudin * Valentina Vladimirova — Masha, Vorobyov's wife == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 comedy-drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Eldar Ryazanov
title: Grandads-Robbers
